ðŸš€ How to Run the Project

##ðŸ”¹ Method 1: Using Visual Studio (Recommended)

  1. Clone the Repository
  2. Open a terminal or Git Bash and run:
git clone https://github.com/lates-codrin/Library-Management.git

  1. Open the Solution File (Library_Management_System.sln)

  2. Restore Dependencies & Build Visual Studio will automatically restore NuGet packages. Then build the project using: Build > Build Solution or Ctrl + Shift + B

  3. Run the Application Click the green Start button or press F5.

Method 2: Download the source code

  1. Download the project from GitHub:

  1. Open the .zip > first folder > .sln solution
  2. Build & run using the built-in Visual Studio tools

Method 3: Download the release

  1. Download the release (x64.zip) here.
  2. Open the .zip > folder > .exe
  3. The application should start as usual
